title: Gotham Season 2 Clip: Gordon Asks Oswald Cobblepot For A Favor
content: (Photo: Fox)Gotham Season 2 Oswald Cobblepot is powerful, self-assured, and terrifying. The season's subtitle is "Rise of the Villains" and in this new clip, featuring Jim Gordon (Ben McKenzie) going to Penguin (Robin Lord Taylor) for a rather large favor.The scene shows a new tone to the series that wasn't present in much of Season ...
